Class com.jconfig.nix.IconBundleNix 
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.jconfig.nix.IconBundleNix

  Summary 

class  IconBundleNix
     extends java.lang.Object
     implements com.jconfig.IconBundle
{
          // Fields 1
     private static final String copyrightString;

          // Constructors 1
     IconBundleNix();

          // Methods 4
     void checkWhichIconValue(int);
     public int getIcon(int, int, int, int[]);
     public int getIconHeight(int);
     public int getIconWidth(int);
}

Superclass for the Nix classes which implement IconBundle. This is a preliminary class derived from the Windows class of similar name. This class may be replaced or modified in a future version.

Author:
Copyright (c) 1997-2002 Samizdat Productions. All Rights Reserved.

· getIcon

Summary  |  Top 
   public int getIcon(int whichIcon, 
                      int xform, 
                      int align, 
                      int[] pData)

Get the bits of the icon, in Java's ARGB format, into the pData array. Subclasses should override.

· checkWhichIconValue

Summary  |  Top 
   void checkWhichIconValue(int whichIcon)

If 'whichIcon' is not ICON_LARGE or ICON_SMALL, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
